document.full_text: the n.c.a.a. is accusing ohio state coach jim tressel of lying to hide violations by players who traded memorabilia for cash and tattoos.
document.title: n.c.a.a. alleges tressel lied to hide violations
lines_and_colors: the n.c.a.a. is accusing ohio state coach jim tressel of lying to hide violations by players who traded memorabilia for cash and tattoos.
